subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: His passion for tennis renewed, Thomas Muster, 43, plans to resume his comeback next season. Muster, once ranked No. 1, lost in his first match on the ATP Tour after 11 years away.
snippet: His passion for tennis renewed, Thomas Muster, 43, plans to resume his comeback next season. Muster, once ranked No. 1, lost in his first match on the ATP Tour after 11 years away.
